Wire Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Breakpoint StatusReads or writes the status of a breakpoint on a wire. Details
DescriptionSets or returns a description of the wire. Details
Is Broken?Returns TRUE if the wire is broken or in a bad state. Details
Joints[]Returns an array of all joints of the wire, which includes intersections, bends, and end points. Details
LabelReturns a reference to the label associated with this wire. Details
ProbeReferences the probe associated with this wire. Details
Terminals[]References the terminals connected by this wire. Details
Wire WidthReturns the width of the wire in pixels. Details
